system.description: The triggering attack inflicts Frozen 5 on all valid targets on hit. If the triggering attack was Freeze Shock or Ice Burn, the attack also inflicts Blinded 5. Passive: if the user is White Kyurem, they gain the Turboblaze Ability as an Extra Ability. If the user is Black Kyurem, they gain the Teravolt Ability as an Extra Ability.
